item.title: Bulletin updated at 11:30 HKT 07/Jun/2016
item.author: Hong Kong Observatory
item.description:
General Situation:
A trough of low pressure will continue to linger over the south China coast in the next several days. Weather over the region will remain unsettled. An active southwesterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong over the weekend and early next week. There will be heavy showers and squally thunderstorms over the region.

Date/Month: 08/06 (Wednesday)
Wind: South force 3.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms.
Temp range: 26 - 30 C
R.H. range: 80 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 09/06 (Thursday)
Wind: South force 3 to 4.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms.
Temp range: 26 - 29 C
R.H. range: 80 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 10/06 (Friday)
Wind: South to southwest force 4.
Weather: Cloudy with showers and squally thunderstorms.
Temp range: 26 - 29 C
R.H. range: 80 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 11/06 (Saturday)
Wind: Southwest force 4 to 5.
Weather: Cloudy with showers. Showers will be heavy at times with squally thunderstorms.
Temp range: 26 - 29 C
R.H. range: 80 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 12/06 (Sunday)
Wind: Southwest force 4 to 5.
Weather: Cloudy with showers and squally thunderstorms.
Temp range: 27 - 30 C
R.H. range: 80 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 13/06 (Monday)
Wind: Southwest force 4 to 5.
Weather: Cloudy with showers and squally thunderstorms.
Temp range: 27 - 30 C
R.H. range: 80 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 14/06 (Tuesday)
Wind: Southwest force 4, occasionally force 5 offshore.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms.
Temp range: 28 - 31 C
R.H. range: 80 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 15/06 (Wednesday)
Wind: Southwest force 3 to 4.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms.
Temp range: 28 - 31 C
R.H. range: 80 - 95 per Cent

Date/Month: 16/06 (Thursday)
Wind: South force 2 to 3.
Weather: Mainly cloudy with a few showers.
Temp range: 27 - 31 C
R.H. range: 70 - 90 per Cent

Sea surface temperature at 7 A.M. 07/06/2016 at North Point was 26 degrees C.
Soil temperatures at 7 A.M. 07/06/2016 at Hong Kong Observatory :
0.5 M below surface was 28.1 degrees C
1.0 M below surface was 27.9 degrees C
